Main Event: Raufeon Stots (19-1-0) vs. Patchy Mix (17-1-0) Co-Main Event: Ilima-Lei Macfarlane (12-2-0) vs. Kana Watanabe (11-1-1) Main Card: Aaron Pico (10-4-0) vs. James Gonzalez (10-5-0) Main Card: Ray Borg (16-5-0) vs. Kyoji Horiguchi (31-5-0) Prelim: Yancy Medeiros (15-8-0) vs. Charlie Leary (17-13-1) Prelim: Mads Burnell (16-5-0) vs. Justin Gonzales (14-1-0) Prelim: Kai Kamaka III (10-5-1) vs. Adli Edwards (9-2-0) Prelim: Sumiko Inaba (5-0-0) vs. Veta Arteaga (7-4-0) Prelim: Keoni Diggs (10-2-0) vs. Weber Almeida (7-1-0) Prelim: Bobby King (12-5-0) vs. Aalon Cruz (10-4-0) Prelim: Davion Franklin (5-1-0) vs. Kasim Aras (7-1-0) Prelim: Ilara Joanne (11-6-0) vs. Bruna Ellen (6-4-0) Prelim: Alexey Shurkevich (13-5-0) vs. Masayuki Kikuiri (8-2-1)
